title: Support main looking to join a team as a sub
body:
Do not have to be competitive but I am just looking to join a team and play for fun. Please check me out and add me ingame. In rank I main support however can play other roles.

I do not flame and am very open minded. I do not consider myself a shotcaller but consider objectives more important than kills.

Willing to help my teammates improve. 

Edit. If rank matters I am Diamond5. Not looking to get any higher for SoloQueue.

replies.body: What kind of comp is it? if there is a level cap, i might not be able to join seeing as im level 23 but if there is no cap ill happily sub. Im 15 and main thresh/azir supp, but play anything. Im not too good at anything except thresh :P but if its only a sub ill fill in
Hi, I do not have a competition formed or a team. I am looking for one to join whether they play seriously or just for fun.
